td.content: s:a 23 YO white M complains of recurrent moderate abdominal pain over the past month. he drinks alcohol occasionally he smokes a pack/day for 3 years o:Height 64 in, Weight 124 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed omeprazole - 20 mg IV daily (4-8 week treatment), and ordered Reticulocyte Count.

td.content: s:M student aged 25 years presents with 2 years history of Body Aches. o:Height 64 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Osteoarthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed naproxen - 500 mg up to 3x day, and ordered Hand Xray.

s:patient presents with moderate abdominal pain. he is having symptoms 13-14 times a week, in spite of treatment. patient is a 25 yo male. o:Height 64 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Reticulocyte Count.
